overview: The film revolves around Sagnik, Anindya and Kaushi, who live together and dream big. Anindya wants to become a hero, Kaushik is a boxer and is desirous to marry his boxer coach, and Sagnik wants to become a playback singer. However, none of them can pursue their goals for lack of money and other reasons. One day they see an advertisement promising INR 10 millions and jump for the opportunity.
title: Sare Chuattor Ghosh Para
